targets.expr: (avg((1 - (node_filesystem_avail_bytes{group="database", mountpoint="/",fstype=~"ext4|xfs"} / node_filesystem_size_bytes {group="database", mountpoint="/",fstype=~"ext4|xfs"})) * 100) by (instance)) or avg(instance:up{group="database"}*99) by (instance)
